import React from 'react'; import { Component } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom'; import { ToastContainer } from 'react-toastify'; import { getProgramT } from '../../../../redux/actions/programThematicA.js'; import EditProgramT from '../editProgramT.js'; import { getListGeneralC } from '../../../../redux/actions/generalClassA.js'; import { getListRelational } from '../../../../redux/actions/relationalClassA.js'; import PtCompetitionG from './ptCompetitionG.js'; class ThematicList extends Component { componentWillMount() { this.props.getProgramT(localStorage.getItem('Token'), sessionStorage.getItem('programT')) } save(general, relation) { this.props.getListGeneralC(localStorage.getItem('Token'), sessionStorage.getItem('programId'), general); this.props.getListRelational(localStorage.getItem('Token'), sessionStorage.getItem('programT'), relation); } render() { return (

); } } function mapStateToProps(state) { return { programTh: state.programThematic.programTR } } export default withRouter(connect(mapStateToProps, { getProgramT, getListRelational, getListGeneralC })(ThematicList));
